sentences: Cooper graduated wit a bachelor's degree from Columbia College in 1971 and was formerly a singer in the band Sha Na Na, formed by his Columbia classmates, and sang the lead in "At the Hop" in the Woodstock movie.
He has also made appearances on The Tonight Show and The Merv Griffin Show.
In 1997, he was appointed to a position at the Jewish Theological Seminary.
In 1998, he was appointed Professor of Bible at Union Theological Seminary in New York, becoming the first person to hold a joint professorship at both Union and JTS.
